faceIdentity.faceIdentificationsFooter: 人脸识别结果非可信，仅供参考
faceIdentity.tryFaceDetectionAgain: 再次对此图片尝试检测？

noProcesses.title: No processors
noProcesses.description: No main App.py image processors detected!

labels.showingActivityStartOfDay: 以选定日期为开始显示活动情况
labels.srImage: 经超分辨率处理的图片

cars.byDefaultDescription: 默认仅加载今日车辆图片，选择时间段加载更多
cars.requireAttentionDescription: 请注意，这些车辆需要添加信息
cars.addNewPlateDescription: 基于检测添加车牌。 更正图片中车牌。 车牌中 "-" 字符可有可无。

owners.editPlateDescription: 你正在编辑已有车牌. 车牌中 "-" 字符可有可无。

personTraining.title: 人物分类与训练
personTraining.clickImageDescription: 点击改图然后选择图中人物是谁. 这将用于网络训练。

plateTraining.plateTrainingDescription: 车牌检测训练仅可用于旧版jQuery. 请点击一下链接。

configuration.moveToProcessedHint: Determines are input images placed under /processed folder in same path as origin image is taken from.
configuration.processSleepSecondsHint: How long looping process should sleep before next image processing run.
configuration.cv2ImshowEnabledHint: If enabled, python process shows a window of what it's seeing. Does not work with containers.
configuration.ignoredLabelsHint: Yolo detection will ignore following labels. Separate new ones with comma.
configuration.cameraNamesHint: Camera names. Folders specified below. Separate new ones with comma. Should not be changed afterwards.
configuration.cameraFoldersHint: Where to load images from. Separate new ones with comma. Can be changed later if location changes.
configuration.openAlprEnabledHint: Software for detecting and reading license plates from images.
configuration.usePlateCharLengthHint: Custom option to maybe affect accuracy.
configuration.jpegStreamNamesHint: Name for stream. Separate with comma.
configuration.jpegStreamsHint: Camera stream address. Stream grab is handy for taking snapshots from camera streams.
configuration.deleteFilesHint: This process tries to save some spaces by deleting similar images. You can make it permanently delete photos if needed so.
configuration.useGpuHint: Using GPU requires complicated CUDA setup.
configuration.maxWidthHint: This improves license plate detection so process it only for smaller images.
